best game just gaben pls make a good anti cheat

I have been playing CS for more than 15 years and CSGO made me quit.

Recently i stopped playing CSGO because Valve is incompetent and can't fight efficiently against cheaters. They can financially squeeze the ignorant users with skins, but they are too incompetent to create a pleasurable experience for the majority of users.

And the cherry being that Valve decided to put me in lower trust groups which means i get to enjoy more cheaters. All because the community is so paranoid that they report everyone who can play at all.

500 dollar skin for the "classic knife from 1.6" and users who report everyone or have completely given up on reporting cheaters. Go figure.

BTW Valve, cheaters wouldn't be an issue if you used created a higher trust class with Official ID and webcam to verify users. I guess that is bureaucratic for you and doesn't give you direct $ you fools.
Vary gay game much ruski puski and cheater player not recomend.
Игра очень хорошая но, есть люди которые играют нечестно с использованием "читов". По этому некоторые люди её забрасывают. Но мне всё ровно на этих читеров и CS:GO всегда останеться в моём сердечке)
